import React from "react"; export default function AboutMe() { return (

About Me

Hello stranger! My name is B. Srinivasan and I build full-stack web projects that solve real problems. I specialize in creating fast, responsive, and scalable applications using technologies like React.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS.

While I’m confident working across the full stack, I have a particular passion for crafting smooth frontend experiences and building responsive, performance-optimized interfaces.

I enjoy breaking down complex problems, optimizing workflows, and continuously learning new tools to stay at the edge of modern web development. I'm also experienced with animation libraries like Framer Motion and have integrated secure backend and database solutions in multiple projects.

Outside of tech, I’m someone who thrives on creativity. Whether it’s designing, writing, or exploring new ideas, I love expressing concepts that go beyond just code.

Check out my resume to know more about my technical skillsets.

); }
